tetra.improvement.trait_waterstone.name: Aquatic
tetra.improvement.trait_waterstone.descr: Holding this tool while underwater, grants extra mobility along with better vision and water breathing. This will slowly wear down the tool.
tetra.improvement.trait_leafstone.name: Natural
tetra.improvement.trait_leafstone.descri: Leaf Stones aren't really meant for tools. However, their regenerative properties could prove useful. The tool will slowly heal you and itself while in yout main hand.
